homePage.title: QPART – we provide services for metalworking and production of parts and spare parts of any complexity. Contact us: +380989950760, info@qpart.com.ua
homePage.description: TURNING AND MILLING WORKS ON CNC MACHINES
homePage.descriptionCompany: We provide metalworking services and manufacture parts and spare parts of any complexity. We perform work according to the customer's drawings or, if necessary, develop design and technical documentation from scratch. Finished products are shipped throughout Ukraine and abroad. We have experience working with foreign companies.

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.title: CNC TURNING
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.description: We do what others call impossible. A large fleet of CNC machines, modern technologies, and a team of professionals allow us to manufacture parts of any complexity and volume.
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.descriptionBottom: Looking for a partner who can handle large batches, complex shapes, and tight deadlines? You've found one.

infoCard.title: We Handle Any Volume of Turning Works
infoCard.description: We understand that your business can't wait. Thanks to modern capacities and established logistics, your order will be completed in the shortest possible time. Forget about long production times — we work quickly and efficiently.

infoCard.title: Fast Order Fulfillment
infoCard.description: Our fleet includes over 300 modern CNC machines that operate non-stop. We process large batches of parts without problems. Want to order large volumes of products? No problem. If your suppliers can't handle the load, we are ready to take on your order and deliver it on time.

infoCard.title: Precision and Manufacturing of Any Complexity
infoCard.description: Our machines allow us to produce large parts with a diameter of up to 4000 mm and a length of up to 8000 mm. Need small, complex parts starting from 10 mm? We will make them with maximum precision. Where others fail, we offer solutions and ask, 'When do we start?'

infoCard.title: Comprehensive Approach
infoCard.description: From machining to final finishing — we are ready to support your project at every stage. Our clients receive a complete solution: from CNC turning to preparing parts for use.

ourEquipment.title: CNC Lathe Machine
ourEquipment.name: GILDEMEISTER NEF CT40
description: Processing diameter in chuck: up to 190 mm
Processing diameter in collet chuck: up to 65 mm

ourEquipment.title: Universal CNC Lathe Machine
ourEquipment.name: HITACHI SEIKI HITEC-TURN 20
description: Processing diameter in chuck: up to 210 mm

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.callToAction: We are ready to become your reliable partner in turning works!

zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.title: Metal Welding
zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.description: Welding work of any complexity becomes a reality thanks to our advanced equipment and innovative approaches. We ensure the precision, strength, and reliability of every weld, regardless of the scale and type of metal.
zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Need quality welding? We are ready to help you realize even the most complex ideas.

infoCard.title: Innovative Solutions for Complex Structures
infoCard.description: We provide comprehensive welding services, guaranteeing high quality and compliance with modern standards. Thanks to advanced equipment and experienced specialists, you can be confident in the durability and flawless execution of any metal structure.

infoCard.title: Wide Range of Technologies. Our welding capabilities include:
Support at Every Stage
infoCard.description: We take care of the full cycle of metal processing: from preparation to final production. Our goal is to provide you with a finished part without the need to involve other contractors.

infoCard.title: Specialized Solutions
infoCard.description: We offer welding for creating custom constructions that require unique technologies and expertise.

zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.callToAction: Trust us with your tasks, and we will show you what true professionalism in welding looks like!

porizkaNaVerstati.title: BAND SAW CUTTING
porizkaNaVerstati.description: We offer professional metal cutting using CNC equipment, ensuring high speed and flawless results. Our solutions are perfect for processing large volumes of material, guaranteeing the precision of every cut.
porizkaNaVerstati.descriptionBottom: Looking for a partner for reliable metal cutting? We are always ready to collaborate.

infoCard.title: Precision and Speed of Metal Cutting
infoCard.description: We specialize in band saw cutting of workpieces of various shapes and sizes. Our equipment allows us to work with a wide range of materials and ensures high reliability of every cut.

infoCard.title: Professional Approach to Any Order
infoCard.description: Our equipment fleet includes over 10 CNC band saws capable of processing workpieces with diameters ranging from 10 to 550 mm. Vertical band saws allow for the cutting of long sheets or specialized structures.

infoCard.title: Complete Processing
infoCard.description: We offer not just metal cutting, but a full cycle of services, including preparation of parts for further processing. You won't need to spend time coordinating with other contractors — we handle everything in one place.

infoCard.title: Solutions for Unique Tasks
infoCard.description: Our team ensures precise metal cutting for projects with non-standard requirements, achieving perfect results.

porizkaNaVerstati.callToAction: Order metal cutting from us and experience our speed and quality!

lyttyaMetaluPage.title: Metal Casting
lyttyaMetaluPage.description: Modern casting technologies help us manufacture complex and reliable parts from various materials. We ensure quality at every stage of production, guaranteeing compliance with the highest standards.
lyttyaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Looking for specialists for complex cast parts? We will turn your idea into reality.

infoCard.title: Perfection and Long Service Life of Cast Products
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of metal casting services, including the production of complex parts for various industries. Thanks to our innovative solutions, you receive products with flawless precision, exceptional reliability, and long service life.

infoCard.title: Innovative Casting Technologies. Our capabilities include:

list.description: Low-pressure casting of high-temperature steels and non-ferrous metals

infoCard.title: Full Production Cycle
infoCard.description: We provide all stages, from the development of the technological process to the delivery of finished products. This ensures you receive products that meet the highest quality standards.

infoCard.title: Wide Selection of Materials
infoCard.description: We work with various types of metals, including high-alloy steels and non-ferrous alloys, to ensure the perfect result for any project.

lyttyaMetaluPage.callToAction: Submit an application today and receive products that meet your expectations and even exceed them!

frezerniRoboty.title: CNC MILLING PROCESSING
frezerniRoboty.description: Our CNC centers can perform milling with high precision, even for the most complex parts. Professional expertise and modern equipment allow us to handle large batches and non-standard shapes.
frezerniRoboty.descriptionBottom: Looking for a partner you can trust with complex tasks? We are ready to work for your success.

infoCard.title: Reliable Solutions for Complex Tasks
infoCard.description: Our milling capabilities enable the production of parts with the highest precision and complexity. We use modern equipment that ensures impeccable reliability of the final products.

infoCard.title: Capacity for Large and Small Parts. In our equipment fleet:

list.description: Horizontal machines with quick table-changing capabilities
Portal 5-axis centers for processing parts up to 2000×4000 mm.

infoCard.title: Full Cycle Processing
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of milling services to ensure your project is executed flawlessly — from drawing to finished part. Thanks to our capabilities, we work efficiently without compromising quality.

infoCard.title: Additional Capabilities
infoCard.description: Our technologies are suitable for creating complex 3D structures for innovative projects and manufacturing simple and standard parts for a wide range of tasks. We handle any requests, regardless of complexity.

frezerniRoboty.callToAction: Start working with us today and experience the benefits of working with professionals!

termichnaObrobkaPage.title: HEAT TREATMENT
termichnaObrobkaPage.description: We ensure high-quality metal heat treatment thanks to state-of-the-art equipment and an experienced team. Your products will gain the required strength, durability, and compliance with standards.
termichnaObrobkaPage.descriptionBottom: Looking for a reliable partner for heat treatment? We offer solutions that work.

infoCard.title: Strengthening and Durability of Parts
infoCard.description: We specialize in thermal processing of metal to ensure optimal mechanical performance for your parts. Our technologies provide the necessary level of strength and reliability.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive Service
infoCard.description: From initial processing to final refinement — we accompany each stage to ensure you receive a finished part of the highest quality.

infoCard.title: Specialized Technologies
infoCard.description: We apply advanced processing methods to create parts that meet the most stringent requirements and standards.

termichnaObrobkaPage.callToAction: Submit your request now, and your products will become a benchmark of reliability!

lazernaRizkaPage.title: LASER CUTTING WITH CNC
lazernaRizkaPage.description: The laser cutting technology we use guarantees perfect precision and cleanliness of processing. We work with various materials, ensuring excellent results even for complex tasks.
lazernaRizkaPage.descriptionBottom: Your parts deserve the best quality. We will ensure it for you.

infoCard.title: Modern Cutting Technologies
infoCard.description: Our laser machines ensure impeccable processing precision, essential for complex geometric structures and high-precision tasks.

infoCard.title: Capabilities for Any Task
infoCard.description: We cut metals up to 20 mm thick and process large blanks. Process automation allows us to complete even large orders in a short time.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive Services
infoCard.description: You receive parts ready for further use, without the need for additional operations. We offer a full cycle of laser metal processing.

infoCard.title: Creating Functional Components
infoCard.description: Our technologies allow us to manufacture parts of any complexity, considering the smallest technical requirements and project specifics.

lazernaRizkaPage.callToAction: Order laser cutting from us and experience our professionalism in action!

shlifovkaMetaluPage.title: Metal Grinding
shlifovkaMetaluPage.description: We offer high-precision surface grinding, achieving perfect smoothness. Our specialists and modern equipment ensure quality even for the most challenging tasks.
shlifovkaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Want perfectly processed parts? We know how to do it.

infoCard.title: Perfect Cleanliness and Precision
infoCard.description: We provide high-quality grinding to create parts with perfectly smooth surfaces and high precision, in accordance with your technical requirements.

infoCard.title: Extensive Equipment Selection. Our inventory includes:

list.description: Equipment for internal and thread grinding

infoCard.title: Complete Processing
infoCard.description: We take care of the entire processing cycle, ensuring you receive products that meet all your expectations and standards.

infoCard.title: Specialized Solutions
infoCard.description: We process non-standard surfaces and complex elements, ensuring they meet the highest requirements.

shlifovkaMetaluPage.callToAction: Entrust your orders to us and experience impeccable quality!

piskostruminniRoboty.title: SANDBLASTING
piskostruminniRoboty.description: Effective cleaning of surfaces from contaminants and corrosion is our specialty. Modern equipment and advanced technologies allow us to achieve the best results for various types of materials.
piskostruminniRoboty.descriptionBottom: Choose quality and professionalism for sandblasting. We are ready for your tasks.

infoCard.title: Effective Cleaning for Perfect Results
infoCard.description: We offer a wide range of sandblasting services that remove contaminants, corrosion, and old coatings from any material.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive Approach
infoCard.description: We provide a full processing cycle so you receive a finished product that fully meets your expectations.

infoCard.title: Unique Capabilities
infoCard.description: We offer a complete cleaning service cycle, so you receive finished parts without needing to contact other contractors.

piskostruminniRoboty.callToAction: Order processing from us and see that your products will look flawless!

zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.title: Manufacturing of Railway Infrastructure Components
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.description: QPart specializes in the production of high-quality components for railway infrastructure. We ensure the manufacturing of various components that meet all modern safety and operational reliability standards.
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.descriptionBottom: Our solutions are suitable for both the modernization of existing systems and the construction of new railway facilities.

listServices.description: Modern equipment. The use of CNC machines guarantees high manufacturing precision.
Quality control. All components undergo verification to comply with international standards.
Flexibility in order execution. We work with both large batches and individual items.
Quick timelines. We ensure prompt production without compromising quality.

listOrderBenefits.title: Ready for large volumes – we ensure uninterrupted operations even for large-scale orders.
Over 300 CNC machines – modern equipment guarantees precision, quality, and speed.
Flexible deadlines – we work fast and always on time!

listPeculiarities.description: Tension bolts, anchor systems, support parts.
Metal structures for bridges, tunnels, platforms.
Specialized products according to customer drawings;

zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.question: Need railway parts?
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.answer: We will produce them to your order, taking all requirements into account!

zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.title: Production of Spare Parts for Agricultural Machinery
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.description: Our company specializes in creating high-quality spare parts for agricultural machinery, considering the needs of farmers and the features of modern farming equipment.
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.descriptionBottom: We offer a wide range of parts suitable for various types of machinery, ensuring its uninterrupted operation even under the toughest conditions. Equip your machinery with high-quality spare parts.

listServices.description: Modern equipment. The use of CNC machines guarantees high manufacturing precision.
Quality control. All parts undergo testing to meet international standards.
Flexibility in order fulfillment. We handle both large batches and individual items.
Fast turnaround times. We ensure quick production without compromising quality.

listOrderBenefits.title: Ready for large volumes – we ensure uninterrupted operations even for large-scale orders.
Over 300 CNC machines – modern equipment guarantees precision, quality, and speed.
Flexible deadlines – we work fast and always on time!

listPeculiarities.description: Components for forage harvesting equipment: knives, shredders, shafts that ensure uninterrupted operation of livestock machinery.
Parts for loaders and manipulators: hydraulic cylinders, mounts necessary for reliable functioning of auxiliary equipment.
Custom parts: we manufacture bespoke spare parts according to specific customer requests.

zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.question: Looking for spare parts for agricultural machinery?
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.answer: Order from us, and we will manufacture them specifically for your equipment!

description.introductionStrong: We use cookies and similar technologies to analyze user behavior on our website.

description.useInformation: This information is used exclusively for

descriptionList.title: Visit data:

descriptionList.title: Site actions:

descriptionList.description: Using analytics tools such as Google Analytics, we collect anonymous data about your activities on the site, such as traffic sources, time on site, and other metrics.

howWeuseData.whatIsTheDataForStrong: analyzing site performance, improving content, and enhancing user experience.
howWeuseData.dataTransfer: We do not share this data with third parties except for analytics purposes using tools such as

consentToUse.description: By using our site, you agree to the collection of data through cookies for the purposes mentioned above. If you do not want us to use these technologies, you can set your browser to block cookies or notify you about them.

additionalInformation.legalRequirements: We collect and process data in accordance with data protection laws, including
additionalInformation.legalRequirementsContinuation: for citizens of the European Union and the
